assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Banco ABC Brasil S.A., a commercial bank, provides various financial products and services to middle and large companies in Brazil. It offers current and time accounts; loan products, such as payroll-linked, working capital, and foreign currency loans; guarantees; derivatives; revolving credit; foreign exchange services; and internet banking services. The company also provides investment products, such as bank deposit certificates, agribusiness credit bills, real estate credit bills, and structured transaction certificates. In addition, it offers customized advisory services to coordinate, execute, and negotiate mergers, acquisitions, sales, investments, corporate restructurings, privatizations, and on the preparation for capital markets transactions. Further, it provides insurance products, such as life and guarantee; and operates as energy trader. The company was formerly known as Banco Roma de Investimentos and changed its name to Banco ABC Brasil S.A. in 1997. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil. Banco ABC Brasil S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Marsau Uruguay Holdings SA.
